text: Kono manuharae'i enekuraa maryada na'i yiye allahara lagata ponapatiyakai katha kaba ahira madhyamara bahirae athaba pardara amrata na'iba enekuraa kono bartabahaka praerana karaara bahirae, yi bartabahake kerala te'omra anumatikrame te'om yito bicarae kerala se'itohe ahi karae, te'om sarbocca, prajnamaya
